title: Only the necessary logs and debug information are kept

tosdr.tldr: “We will only keep the minimum of logs and debug information necessary to ensure that we can improve the service and resolve issues that may have occurred. The Service employs a state-of-the art security-centric design of which we make use of to provide the Service.”
